title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 Class.forName() Usage
description: The BidiUtil in win32 contains Class.forName() usage.
OB: The BidiUtil class allows public instantiation despite having no non-static methods. This could potentially lead to unnecessary instantiation.
EB: To mitigate unnecessary instantiation, a private constructor should be added to the BidiUtil class. As there are no non-static methods, making the constructor private would prevent unintended instantiation.
SR:
1. Open the BidiUtil class in the win32 module.
2. Observe the absence of non-static methods.
3. Implement a private constructor in the class to prevent unnecessary instantiation.
4. Verify that this change does not add any additional size and functions as expected.
